name: Taijitu - Infinite Runner
description:
For Web Version : Please Play in Full Screen.(Press Full Screen Button on Bottom Right)

Summary: This game is submitted as part of GMTK 2021 GameJam (Theme "Joined Together)

You play as 2 ninjas who are connected together by Rope Dart. Your task is to run through the night and kill as many raiders as possible and survive the night. Tighten the rope to give a blow to enemies but be aware, the rope can break and so your will! 

Controls: 

You have to use both hands and control 2 ninjas so that rope between them should not break. Destroy skeletons with help of your rope.

Light Ninja

Go LeftLeft ArrowGo RightRight ArrowJumpUp ArrowNinja RunRight Shift

Dark Ninja

Go Left A Go Right D Jump W Ninja Run Left Shift
